root.name: Devilish
root.description: The plot of Devilish tells the story of a prince and princess in an ancient kingdom that were in love with each other. A jealous devil named "Y" turned them into a pair of stone paddles. A magical ball then descended from the heavens with the power to destroy the evil devil and his minions. As the pair of paddles, you must use the magical ball to rid the kingdom of "Y" and his demonic flunkies.
